short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: D3x is an AI agent for hospitality operators to convert guest inquiries into direct bookings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: D3x is an AI agent for hospitality operators to convert guest inquiries into direct bookings. By automating multi-channel messaging, it allows operators to spend less time selling and more time connecting with their guests.
